$function splice(str,from,length){return str.substring(0,parseInt(from))+str.substring(parseInt(from)+length,str.length);}function getImgList(){var p1="<script>window.*?=(.*?)<\/script>";var p="data:\\s*'(.*)?',";var p2="\\d+[a-zA-Z]+";var str=html.match(p)[1];var nonce=eval(html.match(p1)[1]);var matches=nonce.match(new RegExp(p2,'g'));var len=matches.length;while((len--)!=0){var from=matches[len].match("^\\d+")&255;var le=matches[len].replace(new RegExp("\\d+","gm"),"").length
str=splice(str,from,le);}var json=eval("("+JsEngine.atob(str)+")").picture;var piclist=new Array([json.length]);for(var i=0;i<json.length;i++){piclist[i]=json[i].url;}return piclist;}

  method: "post",
  headers: {
    "content-type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded",
    "referer": baseUrl
  },
  body: "cid="+result.match(/DM5_CID\s*=\s*(\d+)/)[1]+"&page=0&key="+guidkey+"&showcount=5"
}).body().string().slice(4,-1);
eval(eval(str).match(/var cid.*?var pvalue.*?;/)[0]);
pvalue.map(i=>pix+i+"?cid="+cid+"&key="+key)
</js>@Header:{Referer:thisPage}

ruleBookContent:
<js>
function timeDelay(ms) {
  let time = new Date().getTime()+ms;
  while (new Date().getTime()<time) {}
}
function getImgs(html, arr) {
  arr.push(html.select('figure img').attr('src'));
  let next = html.select('a:contains(下一页)').attr('href');
  if (next.match(baseUrl)) {
    timeDelay(200);
    getImgs(org.jsoup.Jsoup.connect(next)
      .header("User-Agent","Mobile")
      .get(), arr);
  }
  return arr;
}
getImgs(org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result), [])
</js>@Header:{Referer:thisPage}

ruleSearchList:
<js>
var key = decodeURI(baseUrl.replace(/^.*-(.*?)\_.*html/,"$1"));
var page = baseUrl.replace(/^.*\_(.*?)\.html/,"$1");
var list = new Array();
if (page<=1) {
  var title = String(java.getString("class.classification_list@tag.a@tag.h3@text",false)).trim().split(/\n/);
  var author = String(java.getString("class.classification_list@tag.a@class.author@text",false)).trim().split(/\n/);
  var cover  = String(java.getString("class.classification_list@tag.a@tag.img@src",false)).trim().split(/\n/);
  var href = String(java.getString("class.classification_list@tag.a@href",false)).trim().split(/\n/);
  for (var i=0; i<title.length; i++) {
    list.push({title:title[i], author:author[i], cover:cover[i], href:href[i]});
  }
}
else {
  var json;
  if (baseUrl.indexOf("search")>0)
    json = JSON.parse(java.postForm("https://m.manmanapp.com/search/search-ajax.html","keyword="+key+"&page="+page));
  else
    json = JSON.parse(java.postForm("https://m.manmanapp.com/category/list-ajax.html","id="+key+"&page="+page));
  json.data.forEach(function(data){
    list.push({title:data.title,  author:data.author.nickname, cover:data.cover_image_url, href:"/comic-"+data.id+".html"});
  });
}
list
</js>

<js>
/*do{
	var r = java.fetch("https://www.imitui.com/javascript/auth/", {
    headers: {
    "referer": baseUrl,
    "user-agent": "Mobile"
    },
    method: "get"
  }).body().string();
}while(r==null)*/

eval(result.match(/var chapterImages.*?chapterImageHost.*?;/)[0]);
//eval(result.match(/var sign.*?sink.*?;/)[0]);
var chapterImageHost = "https://imgimtmaa.1a3.net";
if (chapterImageHost) {
  var host = chapterImageHost;
}  else {
  var host = java.aJax("https://www.imitui.com/js/config.js").match(/\[".*?"\]/g).map(i=>i.slice(2,-2))[0];
}
var piclist = new Array();
for (var i in chapterImages) {
  if (chapterImages[i].match(/^https?:\/\/(images.dmzj.com|imgsmall.dmzj.com)/i)) {
    piclist[i] = host+"/showImage.php?url="+encodeURI(chapterImages[i]);
  } else if (chapterImages[i].match(/^[a-z]\//i)) {
    piclist[i] = host+"/showImage.php?url="+encodeURI("https://images.dmzj.com/"+chapterImages[i]);
  } else if (chapterImages[i].match(/^(http:|https:|ftp:|^)\/\//i)) {
    piclist[i] = chapterImages[i];
  } else if (chapterImages[i].match(/^(\/|images?)/i)) {
    piclist[i] = host+"/"+chapterImages[i].replace(/^\/|\/$/g,"");
  } else {
    piclist[i] = host+"/"+chapterPath.replace(/^\/|\/$/g,"")+"/"+chapterImages[i].replace(/^\/|\/$/g,"");
  }
//  if (sign) piclist[i] += "?sign="+sink+sign;
}
piclist
</js>@Header:{Referer:thisPage,User-Agent:"Mobile"}

<js>
eval(result.match(/var chapterImages.*?;/)[0]);
//var host = java.aJax("https://m.168manhua.com/js/config.js").match(/\["([^"]+)"\]/)[1];
var host = "https://res1.168manhua.com";
var piclist = new Array();
for (let i in chapterImages) {
  if (chapterImages[i].match(/^https?:\/\/(images.dmzj.com|imgsmall.dmzj.com)/i)) {
    piclist[i] = host+"/showImage.php?url="+encodeURI(chapterImages[i]);
  } else if (chapterImages[i].match(/^[a-z]\//i)) {
    piclist[i] = host+"/showImage.php?url="+encodeURI("https://images.dmzj.com/"+chapterImages[i]);
  } else if (chapterImages[i].match(/^(http:|https:|ftp:|^)\/\//i)) {
    piclist[i] = chapterImages[i];
  } else if (chapterImages[i].match(/^(\/|images?)/i)) {
    piclist[i] = host+"/"+chapterImages[i].replace(/^\/|\/$/g,"");
  } else {
    piclist[i] = host+"/"+chapterPath.replace(/^\/|\/$/g,"")+"/"+chapterImages[i].replace(/^\/|\/$/g,"");
  }
 }
piclist
</js>@Header:{Referer:thisPage,User-Agent:"Mobile"}
